Posts.Content:
Its been such a whorlwind! Got my first mammogram(42 cause everything happens to me!) had to get another two days later, now a biopsy. You know as soon as they say they find something, your mind goes right to cancer. I'm not afraid of losing the girls or my hair, I'm afraid of how hard chemo seems. I don't have the best immune system and I'm afraid that I'm not going to be physically strong enough to pull through. 
Do you ALWAYS have to go through chemo?
Any info would be great, seems that once its diagnosed, it goes really fast. Nervous...
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Of course, I'm scheduling a biopsy and am terrified but I'm more afraid that my own body could be harming me. I hate it and am anxious as well but it has to be done. Just remember, it'll be over with soon and at least you will know what's going on :)
Posts.Title: anxiety over having to have a stereotactic biopsy

Posts.Content:
Tammy
Praying for you before, during and after your surgery :) Let us know how you make out sweetie and keep your chin up!!
Laurie
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content:
Two days until my biopsy. One of the nurses saw that I hadn't gotten a call and apologized for not being there for me. Nervous as I'm not sure what to expect (how much pain is involved in a biopsy) God blessed my with a great husband, I just wish he didn't always have to be so strong for me. Keeping my fingers crossed and praying that whatever they find won't be C...
Prayers to us all :)
Laurie
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content:
Feel like I'm being jerked around. Had first mammo four o'clock. Got a call eight am the next day that they found microcalcifications, will need biopsy. Had my "consultation" before biopsy which was almost word for word what I was told after second mammo. Called for my schedule of biopsy but "she's on vacation this week but I'll be sure to have her call you just as soon as she can". Was / IS very scared because it all happened so fast, I thought I had reason to be afraid but now everyone seems to be dragging their feet. Maybe I shouldn't be so worried??
Any thoughts?
Thanks
Laurie
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content: If you haven't had a mammo I'd say schedule one now. Because its painful I doubt its cancer but should still be checked out.
Posts.Title: sharp pain, throbbing just alittle behind armpit

Posts.Content: The report from the second mammo said "moderate suspicion of malignancy". That's scary but I'm hoping that because it is a very large dedicated facility just for breast cancer, that this is just a fluke and someone will get their head out of the sand!!
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications
